name: Honey-Lime Romaine & Toasted Pepitas Salad

ingredients.name: Romaine lettuce
ingredients.additionalInstruction: torn or cut into bite-sized pieces

preparation: In a mixing bowl, using a Piano Wire Whisk, whisk first 6 vinaigrette ingredients.
Place lettuce and pepitas in a large serving bowl, and toss to coat with vinaigrette.
tips: Crunchy and tangy, this is perfect alongside Epicure Pulled Pork Nachos!
You can make and refrigerate vinaigrette in Epicure Cruet up to a week ahead.
